Name: Kentucky Pear
Ingredients: 30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Pear, apple, vanilla and whiskey are partners in this richly flavoured drink.
History: Created in 2003 by Jes at The Cinnamon Club, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Kentucky Pear contains 175 calories
